2062220.name: HEAVENSCAPE
2062220.description: HEAVENSCAPE is a 3D Y2K horror roguelike based in the early 2000s. Play as ANGEL,  an angel, traveling home from a party at night. Find a way home, or venture off the path; connect with friends, discover secrets, and explore the world.  Be careful about staying out to late - things are pretty scary out in the dark.
2062220.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
